unnormalised: Okay, here's a Quora post on Exam Prep Apps:
normalised: What are some of the best exam prep apps you have used, and why? EdTech category

unnormalised: **What are some of the best exam prep apps you've used, and why? (EdTech category)**

normalised: So, exams are just around the corner, right? I am knee deep in prep for my Railway Recruitment Board exam. This time I am determined to crack it! Studying at two a.m. isn't cutting it anymore, so I am looking into some good exam prep apps.

unnormalised: So, exams are just around the corner, right? I'm knee-deep in prep for my Railway Recruitment Board exam. This time I'm determined to crack it! Studying at 2 a.m. isn't cutting it anymore, so I'm looking into some good exam prep apps.
normalised: Anyone have any recommendations? I need something that covers a wide range of subjects General Knowledge is a killer!, has mock tests that feel like the real thing, and maybe even some video lectures. My friend Rohan swore by one for his N E E T prep back in two thousand and eighteen, but I forgot the name. He scored a great rank, so I am trusting his judgment.

unnormalised: Anyone have any recommendations? I need something that covers a wide range of subjects (General Knowledge is a killer!), has mock tests that feel like the real thing, and maybe even some video lectures. My friend Rohan swore by one for his NEET prep back in 2018, but I forgot the name. He scored a great rank, so I'm trusting his judgment.
normalised: Specifically, I am interested in something that might have content relevant to exams in U P. Also, free or reasonably priced is a huge plus! I am a student, after all, and tuition fees cost an arm and a leg these days. Even paying rupee five hundred is tough!

unnormalised: Specifically, I'm interested in something that might have content relevant to exams in UP. Also, free or reasonably priced is a huge plus! I'm a student, after all, and tuition fees cost an arm and a leg these days. Even paying Rs. 500 is tough!
normalised: Think apps with decent user interfaces too I don't want to be battling a confusing menu when I am trying to remember the capital of Chhattisgarh.

unnormalised: Think apps with decent user interfaces too â€“ I don't want to be battling a confusing menu when I'm trying to remember the capital of Chhattisgarh.
normalised: Ideally something that reminds me to study at zero six hundred hours every morning. Procrastination is my biggest enemy! Deadline is fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four to actually start using one regularly.

unnormalised: Ideally something that reminds me to study at 06:00 hrs every morning. Procrastination is my biggest enemy! Deadline is 15/07/2024 to actually start using one regularly.
normalised: Any insights would be appreciated! Good luck to everyone prepping too! Let's ace those exams!

unnormalised: Any insights would be appreciated! Good luck to everyone prepping too! Let's ace those exams!
